        tmin = as.numeric(tmin),
        year = as.numeric(year),
        month = as.numeric(month),
        day_of_month = as.numeric(day_of_month)

  mutate(
        prcp = (prcp / 10),
        tmax = (tmax / 10),
        tmin = (tmin / 10),
        )
